Articles.Content:
I realise that pretty much everyone has done this on these forums... I realise that I\'ve been working on this for weeks now without success.... I realise that I didn\'t even do it with the vanilla parts and that the landing wasn\'t as smooth as I wanted... but...

I LANDED ON THE MUN!

I\'ve been doing dioramas, little walk cycles and concept art around these forums and yet hadn\'t even achieved what must be the second most attempted mission after simply reaching orbit.

I want my badge now and my five minutes with the president!

But seriously, it\'s a vindication of this game when I can spend weeks trying to get somewhere (and have fun) suddenly realise what all those symbols on the fake horizon are and then suddenly click and land on the Mun on only my second attempt! I love this game!
Congratulations! The mun truly is a great victory. Welcome to the forums, and enjoy your stay!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Pfft! Nope! Only just landed with any fuel and the shock of the landing would have likely broken any delicate engine part I had under the craft.
